text: Donald Rabindranauth Ramotar (born 22 October 1950)"Ramotar gets unanimous selection as PPP Presidential Candidate", Kaieteur News, 5 April 2011. is a Guyanese politician of the People's Progressive Party. He was President of Guyana from 2011 to 2015. His predecessor was Bharrat Jagdeo. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Guyana Category:Socialist politicians
title: Donald Ramotar
